properties.name: spring.test.database.replace
properties.description: Type of existing DataSource to replace.

properties.name: spring.test.observability.auto-configure
properties.description: Whether observability should be auto-configured in tests.

properties.name: spring.test.print-condition-evaluation-report
properties.description: Whether the condition evaluation report should be printed when the ApplicationContext fails to start.

properties.name: spring.test.webtestclient.timeout
properties.description: Maximum amount of time to wait for responses.
